sentences.en: Clinical pregnancy, miscarriage and delivery rates were also recorded.
sentences.cn: 临床受孕率, 流产率和分娩率也被记录.

sentences.en: I can imagine no greater miscarriage of justice than the execution of an innocent man.
sentences.cn: 我想象不出比处死无辜的人更加严重的误判了。

sentences.en: I had another spontaneous miscarriage at around the 16th to 18th week.
sentences.cn: 我在大约第16至18孕周时又经历了一次自然流产。

sentences.en: In the Hague, Mary Longfellow suffered a miscarriage.
sentences.cn: 在海牙, 玛丽·朗费罗流产了.

sentences.en: Jeff: Sometimes, the partiality and miscarriage of justice are dis - gusting too.
sentences.cn: 杰夫: 有时, 裁判的不公平和误判也真是令人讨厌的一件事情.

sentences.en: Less than a year later, she had a miscarriage and died.
sentences.cn: 她出嫁后不到一年, 就因小产死了.

sentences.en: More importantly, the mainstream market funds will be miscarriage of justice.
sentences.cn: 更重要的是, 主流资金对市场也会误判.

sentences.en: One in five pregnancies ends in miscarriage .
sentences.cn: 有五分之一的妊娠以流产告终。

sentences.en: Preious pregnancy termination increased the risk of subsequent miscarriage by 60 percent.
sentences.cn: 前一次终止怀孕可能增加下一次60%的流产危险.不孕的情况可能增加41%流产的危险.

sentences.en: Sending an innocent man to prison is a clear miscarriage of justice.
sentences.cn: 把无辜的人投入监狱显然是审判不公.

sentences.en: She had two miscarriages before she had her first child.
sentences.cn: 她生第一个孩子之前流产了两次。

sentences.en: Smoking during pregnancy increases the risk of miscarriage.
sentences.cn: 怀孕期吸烟会增加流产的危险.

sentences.en: Sometimes, the partiality and miscarriage of justice are dis - gusting too.
sentences.cn: 有时, 裁判的不公平和误判也真是令人讨厌的一件事情.

sentences.en: Spontaneous abortion at earlier stages of pregnancy is called miscarriage.
sentences.cn: 流产可自然发生,称自然流产.

sentences.en: Women who smoke are more to have a miscarriage.
sentences.cn: 女性吸烟者更容易流产.

sentences.en: You must admit that's a miscarriage of goods.
sentences.cn: 你必须承认那是货物的误投.

trans.tran_cn: 流产，早产，（信件等的）误投，误送，失策，失败
trans.tran_en: if a woman who is going to have a baby has a miscarriage, she gives birth before the baby is properly formed and it dies
